data.title: SONY HCD-FX888K SERVICE MAN Pdf Download
data.meta_description: View and Download Sony HCD-FX888K service man online. HCD-FX888K receiver pdf manual download.
data.text:
Page 1: Service Manual

3 7 63 1515 0 SERVICE MANUAL E Model Australian Model Ver. 1.0 2005.05 HCD-FX888K is the amplifier, DVD/CD and tuner section in DAV-FX888K. This system incorporates with Dolby*1 Digital and Model Name Using Similar Mechanism Dolby Pro Logic (II) adaptive matrix surround decoder...

Page 2 COMPONENTS IDENTIFIED BY MARK 0 OR DOTTED LINE WITH MARK 0 ON THE SCHEMATIC DIAGRAMS AND IN THE PARTS LIST ARE CRITICAL TO SAFE OPERATION. REPLACE THESE COMPONENTS WITH SONY PARTS WHOSE PART NUMBERS APPEAR AS SHOWN IN THIS MANUAL OR IN SUPPLEMENTS PUBLISHED BY SONY.

Page 3: Table Of Contents

HCD-FX888K 3 7 63 1515 0 TABLE OF CONTENTS SERVICING NOTE 6-4. Printed Wiring Board – DMB10 Section (Side A) – ..35 ........... 4 6-5. Printed Wiring Board – DMB10 Section (Side B) – ..36 6-6. Schematic Diagram – DMB10 Section (1/4) – ....37 GENERAL ..............

Page 4: Servicing Note

To prevent a malfunction, the system has performed the self- (xx is a number) diagnosis function. u163 ,Contact your nearest Sony dealer or local authorized Sony service facility and give the 5- character service number. Example: E 61 10 http://www.xiaoyu163.com...

Page 22 HCD-FX888K 3 7 63 1515 0 4-4. MIRROR TIME ADJUSTMENT DVD SECTION 4-1. GENERAL DESCRIPTION To enter Mirror Time Adjustment, press 5 “R” button on the remote commander. The screen will appear as below. The Mirror Time and IOP measurement allows you to make...

Page 23 HCD-FX888K 3 7 63 1515 0 (3) Select “5. MIRR time Adjust”. (14) Confirm the same values are displayed. If it is not same, return to step 7. Drive Manual Operation MIRR time Adjust Menu 1. Servo Control 2. Track/Layer Jump 1.

Manual Adjust In order to execute mirror time adjustment, the following standard procedures must be followed. 1. Track Balance Adjust: 2.
